item.title: PLC syntax help
item.description: In ECMC, PLCs are based on the exprtk expression evaluation library. For detailed syntax help please visit the exprtk website common errors, misconceptions and info operators :=: assignment = or ==: equal comparison functions PLC do not write to the bus! The data will be send to the bus with the next cycle. statement terminator Statements are terminated by a semicolon ; variables All variables are initiated to 0
